## Student Checklist
- [ ] Week number:
- [ ] Time spent (hh:mm):
- [ ] All success criteria complete
- [ ] Tests passing locally (`dotnet test TaskFlowAPI.sln`)
- [ ] PR opened and linked

## Summary

Describe what you built/refactored. Call out intentional smells or TODOs left for future weeks.

## Screenshots / Evidence

- Swagger screenshot or API response URL
- Test output (paste or attach)
- Any notes for reviewer (questions, edge cases, blockers you solved)

## Retro Notes
- What went well?
- What was challenging?
- Where do you need help next week?
